event: Richard A. Hosley II becomes CEO and President of BMC Software
First day of trading for BMC stock on Nasdaq (symbol BMCS) and New York Stock Exchange (symbol BMC)
BMC is re-incorporated in Delaware and goes public with an initial public offering
BMC announces acquisition by a group of major private equity investment groups for $6.9 billion
Acquisition process is completed and BMC is no longer publicly traded
BMC is acquired by KKR from a private investor group led by Bain Capital Private Equity and Golden Gate Capital
BMC launches SaaS-based BMC Helix Control-M application workflow orchestration
Ayman Sayed is named President and CEO of BMC Software
BMC announces the launch of TrueSight suite utilizing AI and machine learning
